i_forgot_my_password_desc: Write your email here and receive a new password
we_sent_one_more_email: We sent a new email to
check_your_auth_app_desc: Please, check your two-factor authentication application on your mobile device for the OTP code.
forgot_password_email_sent: You will receive an email in a few minutes, otherwise request a new email clicking "I did not receive the email"
i_havent_received: I did not receive the email
error_change_password: Error while changing password. Try again.
